doc.title: Inventing Kin
doc.plot: Inventing Kin tells the story of young woman searching for answers in life. After 12 years of not seeing her father, Kin receives a letter from him in one final attempt of her father trying to connect with her. She sets out to meet him and to get to know him finding out along the way he might not have that much time left. She finds out her family is full of wacky inventors, like her grandfather invented the funny glasses with the mustache and her dad invented the plastic party kazoo. Kin decides she would like to add to the family legacy by creating her own unique invention while connecting with her father.
